# Skill

---
name: prd

description: Guide users through a structured workflow for writing Product Requirments Documents (PRDs). Use when user wants to create product spects, feature requirements, or similar product documentation. Helps gather context, draft sections iteratively, and validate completeness.
---

\n\nPRD Writing Workflow

Guide users through context gathering, section drafting, and validation when writing PRDs.

\n\nReference Skills Repository

<https://github.com/anthropic/skills>

\n\nWhen to Use

Trigger when user mentions: "write a PRD", "product spec", or "draft requirements" or starting a new feature/product initiative.

Offer three stages, or work freeform if user declines.

\n
